page.title: 03Trade
page.content: When the area was more heavily populated, it could support a wide range of trades and services. Now the village is fortunate to have a shop-cum-Post Office which manages to meet most of the shopping needs of its customers. This is run by a husband and wife who get up at 5.00 am to deliver milk to the village and surrounding homes. There is also a range of mobile shops which call on a weekly basis, including a fresh fish van, greengrocers and mobile fish and chip van. Other visiting services are: mobile library; newspaper deliveries; window cleaners and two mail deliveries and collections on weekdays.
